GSD.description:
mm/kmemleak: reset tag when compare object pointer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 35b72d8e2c8e324d26a06149e45416a02aa7aec8. For more details please see the references link.
